content: Professor Panos Louvieris | Introduction | Brunel University London Skip to Content Home People Professor Panos Louvieris Professor Panos LouvierisProfessor - Information System Wilfred Brown Building 211 Email: panos.louvieris@brunel.ac.uk Tel: +44 (0)1895 265832 Computer Science College of Engineering, Design and Physical Sciences Summary Panos Louvieris is Professor of Information Systems and leads the Defence & Cyber Security (DCS) research group in the Department of Computer Science at Brunel University London and co-director of the Brunel Intelligent Digital Economy and Society (IDEAS) Research Centre. His research interests are data and information fusion, defence and cyber security analytics, and computational finance in the digital economy. He is co-director of the Trusted Open Models Institute (TOMI) at the Hartree Centre concerning the assurance of AI computational models. He is a committee member of the EPSRC Digital Personhood Network. In addition, he is a member of EPSRC ITaaU+ Network and NEMODE+ Network.
